Package org.apache.mesos.state

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SchemaVersionStore
    Used by StateStore and ConfigStore implementations to retrieve and validate the Schema Version against whatever version is supported by those respective stores.
    Serializer
    Interface for serializing and deserializing objects to byte arrays using some serialization format.
    StateStore
    A StateStore stores the state of the frameworks, including tasks' TaskInfo and TaskStatus objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JsonSerializer
    Implementation of Serializer for JSON input/output.
    JsonSerializerTest  
    PersistentOperationRecorder
    Records the state of accepted offers.
    SchedulerState
    Read/write interface for the state of a Scheduler.
    SchedulerStateTest  
    StateStoreCache
    Thread-safe caching layer for an underlying StateStore.
    StateStoreCacheTest
    Tests for StateStoreCache
    StateStoreUtils
    Utilities for implementations and users of StateStore.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    StateStoreException
    Exception that indicates that there was an issue with storing or accessing values in the state store.
